intro: Umari, commonly known as the African violet, is a popular flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the genus Saintpaulia and is characterized by its velvety, dark green leaves and showy, tubular flowers in shades of purple, pink, and white. Its compact growth habit and ornamental value make it a versatile choice for both decorative and therapeutic purposes.
